{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T09:00:48.000Z", "description": "

Job title: Graduate / Junior Software Developer

Client: Elite trading firm

Salary: Up to $110,000 + package + exceptional bonus!

Location: Boston


The role: Have ownership of multiple greenfield projects with no red tape and working alongside other exceptional technologists in a friendly/collaborative environment + beautiful offices

This role is looking for someone with 0-3yrs experience


  • You'll build features used by research scientists, aerospace engineers, intelligence analysts, and economic forecasters, in countries + funds around the world
  • You will be involved throughout the product lifecycle + collaborate closely with both other technologists, clients, and stakeholders
  • Gain a hands-on understanding on how to work with and manipulate large data sets containing financial data


Skills/experience needed:


-             Excellent understanding of the Computer Science fundamentals

-             An outside interest in technology (meetups, personal projects etc)

-             A related degree (computer science, physics, maths etc) from a reputable University

-             Relevant internships / experience

-             Personality and desire to keep learning! 



If interested, then please apply with your updated CV and if successful you will be contacted
